attributes.action: Remote Education instead of returning to school until Covid-19 is under control
attributes.additional_details:
Corona virus is out of control now in the UK and the new variant is spreading much faster.

Returning to school will definitely accelerating the spreading and risk young people's lives.

Remote education is a much better option, not only providing the necessary education, but also keeping students and parents safe.
Vast majority of families are able to access the remote education and schools can open for key workers' students and those who are not able to join the remote education.
attributes.background: Support primary schools, secondary schools and colleges to provide the remote education, e.g. devices, training as soon as possible
